sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating" import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, address, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews) // formate date const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' } return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated' : ({reviews?.length})} {address}
{city} ${price} / per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ============ tour reviews section ============ */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(reviews => (
HasanulBanna

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString("en-US", options)}

5
Amazing tour
)) }
{/* ============ tour reviews section ============ */}
) } export default TourDetails
